title: My Shop
body: I was online when my shop first became available most recently (9/17/2017) but then there was a bug that needed to be fixed so the entire my shop was taken down for about a day, but i was able to see all of my shop options before they took it down. The shop that I had before when i opened it is different than the options i have now. I would like to know why that is. Is it a completely randomized system? If so thats very disappointing because I would have bought 2 of the skins i had access to at discounted prices but now I'm not sure i want any of the skins. If there could be any clarification on the subject that would be greatly appreciated.

replies.body: When the shop came back up after the bug, the offers were just refreshed. If you wanted one of the first offers, hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!
